name: Barbara R. LÅ‘rincz
bio: With 7 years of web 3.0 expertise, she co-founded the groundbreaking project solarpunk.buzz, fueled by the belief that the self-sovereign future is just a step away. This passionate gamer-turned-activist immerses herself in the metaverse, harnessing its power to ignite the solarpunk revolution and shape a greener tomorrow. Join her on this extraordinary quest to build a sustainable future; feel free to reach out to her and share your ideas on how to embrace the solarpunk utopia!
